subproject.corporate outcome: Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description:
Provincial Capacity Building Programme Phase II (PCaB II) covers the first 3 outputs under the Provincial Planning and Management intermediate outcome of the Democratic Governance and Crisis Management outcome in the UNCP. 
PCaB II focuses on sub-national provincial financial management issues in the context of efforts to improve service delivery and enhance the effectiveness of public programmes. The proposed goal of PCaB II is to strengthen sub-national financial management capacity in a sustainable manner.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Provincial Capacity Building P
